full_summary:
## Request for Standing Offer - Vehicle Maintenance and Repair Services

### Solicitation Number: WS4320369867
### Publication Date: 2023-11-22
### Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-19T14:00:00

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a Standing Offer for vehicle maintenance and repair services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at CDSG Grn St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador. The tender is for a period of one year with two optional one-year periods.

The successful contractor will be responsible for providing all necessary services, including mechanical repairs, body work, and provision of various parts on military and civilian vehicles, on an as-and-when-requested basis.

The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

### Contract Details

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   End User: Department of National Defence (DND)
*   Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Key Dates

*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-19T14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-01-17
*   Expected Contract End Date: The contract has two optional one-year periods after the initial one-year term.

### Contact Information

For any queries or request for a debriefing, please contact: Nicole Fesseha, Contracting Officer, via email at [nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Document Reference

The solicitation document can be accessed through the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18081663?extsite=MTgwODE2NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18081663?extsite=MTgwODE2NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) 

You can also find additional information on the solicitation through the Bid opportunities – Government of Canada page. 

_For any further information, please do not
